attributes.action: Force Councils to Fill all potholes even if they are under the so called 'Limit'
attributes.background: There have been over 1000 deaths in the past 5 years. One that was 1.3 ft deep.... what would you do if that was your child or family member?....

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by "the so-called 'limit'". You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.  For example, you could ask the Government to provide more funding for local councils to spend on repairing potholes.
